name: Elemental Rage
description: Create a cataclysmic storm at the target location that builds for 2 seconds then lays waste to all enemies in the area, dealing 2249 Magic Damage every 1 second for 7 seconds.  Fiery Rage increases the damage by 15%.  Icy Rage immobilizes enemies hit for 3 seconds.  Thunderous Rage increases the duration by 2 seconds.
effectLines: Increases the damage and gains a new effect depending on your staff type.
coefDescription: Create a cataclysmic storm at the target location that builds for 2 seconds then lays waste to all enemies in the area, dealing $1 Magic Damage every 1 second for 7 seconds.  Fiery Rage increases the damage by 15%.  Icy Rage immobilizes enemies hit for 3 seconds.  Thunderous Rage increases the duration by 2 seconds.
rawDescription:
Create a cataclysmic storm at the target location that builds for |cffffff2|r seconds then lays waste to all enemies in the area, dealing <<1>> every <<2>> for <<3>>.

Fiery Rage increases the damage by <<4>>.

Icy Rage immobilizes enemies hit for <<5>>.

Thunderous Rage increases the duration by |cffffff2|r seconds.
